PresentationStep.title: Stop losing your passwords
PresentationStep.description: Keep your passwords safe in your Cozy
PresentationStep.item1: Your passwords will be saved once and for all in your 100% personal and secured safe.
PresentationStep.item2: Your cozy will allow you to instantly fill in the forms of websites, for easy connection to all your services.
PresentationStep.item3: You can connect your brands to your Cozy to recover your data in the blink of an eye.

notSupportedInfos.title: Not available on %{browser}
notSupportedInfos.description: The feature is currently not available on %{browser}. You can however take advantage of it on the following browsers:

SecurityStep.title: Improve your Cozy password
SecurityStep.description: The password of your Cozy becomes the unique key to decrypt your securely stored passwords

advices.strong_passphrase: **Privilege a strong password:** A long password with numbers and special characters will be impossible to break.
advices.memorize: **Memorize it well:** In case of loss, you will not be able to recover the encrypted passwords in your cozy.
advices.our_tip: **Our tip:** Find a short phrase that suits you, for example:

SecurityStep.password-example: Claude est le meilleur nuage français !

SecurityStepOIDC.title: Choose your Cozy Pass password
SecurityStepOIDC.description: Your Cozy Pass password becomes the unique key to decrypt your securely stored passwords
SecurityStepOIDC.description-configured: You configured your Cozy Pass password earlier, your passwords vault is ready.

passphrase.error-setting-passphrase: Could not set passphrase, please retry later

HintStep.title: Leave a password hint
HintStep.description: The hint will be sent to you by email in case you forgot your password, choose a hint that only you can understand
HintStep.hint-configured: Hint configured ✅ You can still change it here.

InstallationStep.title: Install Cozy extension
InstallationStep.descriptionEnd: to your browser. This installation is necessary to allow you to automatically fill in and save your passwords while browsing.

step1.chrome: Click below to open the Chrome Web Store
step1.firefox: Click below to open Firefox Add-ons
step1.safari: Click below to open the Mac App Store then click on **Get**

step2.safari: Then open Safari preferences to activate the extension (Preferences > Extensions)

InstallationStep.step3: Log in with your address **%{address}** and your password!
InstallationStep.step3-oidc: Log in with your address **%{address}** and your Cozy Pass password!

InstallationStepMobile.title: Install the Cozy Pass App
InstallationStepMobile.description: Access your credentials on the go, and automatically fill forms on your mobile.

InstalledStep.title: It's almost finished!
InstalledStep.descriptionEnd: icon on the top right corner of your screen to log in with your address **%{address}** and your Cozy password.
InstalledStep.descriptionEnd-oidc: icon on the top right corner of your screen to log in with your address **%{address}** and your Cozy Pass password.

ConnectedStep.title: Your password manager is configured!
ConnectedStep.description: Go to your Cozy browser extension to manage your passwords

Help.faq: __Help:__ I can't connect
Help.import: Import my credentials from another manager

AvailablePlatforms.text: Find the Cozy extension on the following platforms:

imported.title: Credentials imported
imported.content: You can now find your credentials in your Cozy vault.

errored.title: Error while importing your credentials
errored.content: There was an error while importing your credentials. Please try again.

manifest.long_description:
Keep your passwords safe in your Cozy.

Your passwords are saved once and for all in your 100% personal and secured safe.

Your Cozy allows you to instantly fill in the forms of websites, for easy connection to all your services.

Connect your brands to your Cozy to recover your data in the blink of an eye.
